User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.1; en-US; rv:1.9.2.15) Gecko/20110303 Firefox/3.6.15 GTB7.1
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:2.0b10pre)

It is nice that there are options for setting Tag colours. I would use it a lot more if the Tag colours were simply inverted, so that the background colour was set to the colour selection.

I guess a simpler solution would be to add background colour option to Tags, instead of just text colour. Hopefully TB3.3 will do this?

Currently, on Win7 when you select a msg in the email list it is highlighted in a very nice way. This would be an excellent way to highlight Tagged msg's too.

I find that the coloured text does not stand out enough.


Reproducible: Always
